name: roup - devcontainer (Ubuntu 24.04)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "echo LLVM_VERSION=$LLVM_VERSION; echo RUST_VERSION=$RUST_VERSION; if command -v clang >/dev/null 2>&1; then clang --version | head -n1; elif command -v clang-21 >/dev/null 2>&1; then clang-21 --version | head -n1; else echo 'clang not found'; fi; if command -v rustc >/dev/null 2>&1; then rustc --version; else echo 'rustc not found. Install Rust with: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh'; fi; if command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1; then cargo --version; else echo 'cargo not found. Install Rust with: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh'; fi"
